title: Java Best Practices
subject: Java
learning_objectives: Avoid raw types, utilize Standard Library
theory:
Writing code that Works vs Writing code that Lasts.

1.  **Classes**: PascalCase (MyClass).
2.  **Methods/Vars**: camelCase (myMethod).
3.  **Constants**: UPPER_SNAKE (MAX_PRIORITY).
4.  **SOLID**: Single Responsibility, Open/Closed, Liskov, Interface Segregation, Dependency Inversion.

common_mistakes.correction: `catch(Exception e)` hides real bugs. Catch specific exceptions.

real_world_use_cases.description: These rules are what Seniors look for in Pull Requests.
